SimpleSQLFeatureStore.SQLStatement: SELECT name, title, asbinary(the_geom) FROM some_table WHERE the_geom && st_geomfromtext(?, -1)
SimpleSQLFeatureStore.LODStatement: SELECT name, title, asbinary(st_simplifypreservetopology(the_geom, 1)) FROM some_table WHERE the_geom && st_geomfromtext(?, -1)
SELECT name, title, asbinary(st_simplify(the_geom, 30)) FROM some_table WHERE the_geom && st_geomfromtext(?, -1) and not st_isempty(st_simplify(the_geom, 30))
